text: "Baidu" mobile application privacy policy
Welcome to the services provided by the "Baidu" mobile application!
Baidu (this privacy policy refers to Beijing Baidu Net News Technology Co., Ltd., also known as "we") attaches great importance to your privacy protection and personal information protection.
This privacy policy is suitable for access and use of various services provided by "Baidu" mobile applications in any way.

In order to avoid unnecessary, the "Baidu" mobile application in this privacy policy (in some functional scenarios in this "Baidu" mobile application, also known as "Baidu APP" or "This software")"Mobile application products do not refer to other mobile application products from Baidu or its affiliates.

You can search for information, browse information, watch videos or live broadcasts, publish and interact, shopping/payment, read novels and animation, social and attention, instant messaging, query weather, mini games, download files, registration/registration/registration/registration/registration/registration.Log in to Baidu account, etc. (hereinafter collectively referred to as "'Baidu' Mobile Application Products or Service").
We will only handle personal information you need to use products or services.

"Baidu" mobile applications include, but not limited to multiple application versions such as iOS and Android. Please select a version that matches the installed terminal device when using the "Baidu" mobile application.

The personal information that "Baidu" mobile application may obtain depends on the "Baidu" mobile application version you use, the specific type/version of the terminal device you use, and the functions you use.

This privacy policy aims to help you understand which personal information we will collect, why these personal information is collected, what these personal information will use and how to protect these data.
We will solicit your separate consent in strict accordance with the requirements of laws and regulations.

In addition to this privacy policy, we may also explain the rules of our personal information through product page notifications, pop -ups prompts, information push, etc.The specific rules have the same effect as the privacy policy.

Unless laws and administrative regulations have other provisions, in response to how we handle your personal information, you have the right to know and decide, and have the right to restrict or reject us or other parties to deal with your personal information;
label: Edit/Control

text: At the same time, you have the right to ask us to explain to the personal information processing rules we provide.
Please read and understand the privacy policy carefully before using the "Baidu" mobile application and related products and services to make appropriate choices.
This privacy policy will help you understand the following:
1. The information we collect and the corresponding purpose of the use
2. How do we use cookies and similar technologies
3. How do we share, transfer, and publicly disclose your personal information
4. How do we save and protect your personal information
5. Your rights
6. How do we deal with the personal information of minors
7. How to update this policy
8. How to contact us
We know the importance of personal information to you, and also know that effective protection for your information is the cornerstone of our business healthy and sustainable development.
Thank you for your use and trust in "Baidu"!

We are committed to maintaining your trust in us, abiding by the following principles, and protecting your personal information: the principles of consistency and responsibility, the principles of clear purpose, the principle of choice, at least the principle of safety, the principles of safety, the principle of subject participation, the principle of openness and transparency, etc.Essence

Attachment: term explanation

Personal information refers to the various information related to the recognized or recognizable natural person recorded in electronics or other methods, excluding information after anonymous processing.

Personal information includes names, date of birth, ID number, personal biometric information, address, communication and communication contact information, communication records and content, account password, property information, credit information, travel information, accommodation information, health and physiological information, transactions, transactions, transactionsInformation, etc.

Sensitive personal information refers to personal information that can easily cause the personality and dignity of natural persons to be infringed or harmed by personal and property security, including biometrics, religious beliefs, specific identities, medical health, financial accounts, trajectory trajectory and other informationAnd personal information under minor at the age of 14.
Device refers to devices that can be used to use Baidu products and/or services, such as desktop devices, tablets or smartphones.

Equipment information may include the device attribute information of the terminal device you used to install and run the "Baidu" mobile application (for exampleCode IMSI, network device hardware address Mac, advertising identifier IDFA, supply trademark identification IDFV, mobile device recognition code Meid, anonymous device identifier OAID, integrated circuit card recognition code ICCID, Android ID, hardware serial number and other equipment identifier), Equipment connection information (such as the type of browser, telecommunications operator, language used, WIFI information), and device status information (such as device application installation list).

Log information refers to the requests issued by our server automatically when visiting the "Baidu" mobile application, such as your IP address, the type of browser and the language used, hardware equipment information, operating system versions, network operations, network operations, network operations, network operations, and network operationsBusiness information, the date, time, and length of your access service are provided, formed or reserved when using our products or services.

Cookie refers to a mechanism that supports the server (or script) to store and retrieve information on the client. By adding a simple and persistent client state to expand the web -based client/server application.
The server sends a status information while returning the HTTP object to the client, and is stored by the client.
The state information shows the effective URL range in this state.
Since then, the HTTP request within this range initiated by the client will return the current value of the status information from the client to the server. This state information is called Cookie.

Location information refers to the accurate location information obtained by GPS information, WLAN access points, Bluetooth, base stations, and other sensor information, as well as rough geographical location information obtained through IP addresses or other network information.

User portraits refer to analysis or predictions of personal characteristics of a certain natural person through collecting, gathering, and analyzing personal information, such as their occupations, economy, health, education, personal preferences, credit, behavior, etc., to form their personal characteristic modelEssence
Use personal information of specific natural persons to form a characteristic model of the natural person, called direct user portraits.
The use of personal information from specific natural persons, such as the data of its group, forms a characteristic model of the natural person, called indirect user portraits.
Decoration refers to the process of processing personal information, so that it cannot recognize a specific natural person without using additional information.
Anonymous refers to the process that the personal information subject cannot be recognized by the technical processing of personal information, and the processing information cannot be restored.
The information obtained by personal information after anonymous processing does not belong to personal information.

Baidu platform refers to the special channels or platform services under Baidu Company (including Baidu Search, Baidu Encyclopedia, Baidu Zhi, Baidu Tieba, Baidu Nuomi, Baidu Mobile Assistant and other Baidu products https://www.baidu.com/more/) and other websites, programs, services, tools and clients.
A related company refers to Beijing Baidu Net News Technology Co., Ltd., an operator of "Baidu" Mobile Application, and other companies that are related to the company that are related to Baidu.

"Related relationship" refers to the subject (including individuals, companies, partnerships, organizations, or other entities), that is, the subject that directly or indirectly controls, or the subject that controls it directly or indirectlyMaster controlled by the same subject.

The aforementioned "control" means that through holding voting rights, contracts or other methods, directly or indirectly have the power or other relationships that instructions or instructions that to instructions to make instructions by others.
